Package com.msasc.lib.ml.graph

Class Node

java.lang.Object
com.msasc.lib.ml.graph.Node
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActivationNode, BiasNode, WeightsNode
public abstract class Node extends Object
A node of a neural network computational graph.

In the forward pass, a node reads data, normally values, from the input edges, processes it, and pushes the resulting data to the output edges.

In the backward pass, a node may read data, normally deltas to adjust parameters, from the output edges, does any internal necesary operation, and optionally pushes backward data to the input edges.

Author:
Miquel Sas
